text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case.

How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in {{MULTI}}

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Meeting genre expectations
multi.hover: e.g., knowing when to argue, analyze, describe, etc.; using a central idea in a paper; providing logical transitions between sections

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Revising effectively
multi.hover: e.g., responding to feedback from others about the content of your drafts

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Making and supporting a point
multi.hover: e.g., researching a topic, developing an argument, and organizing appropriate evidence and relevant supporting details

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Evaluating and synthesizing information
multi.hover: i.e., effectively and coherently incorporating appropriate evidence and relevant research into your writing

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Analyzing information
multi.hover: i.e., understanding how meaning is made, and how and why it is communicated

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Addressing audience needs and expectations
multi.hover: i.e., using appropriate strategies and style to achieve your desired effect

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Editing
multi.hover: e.g., identifying and correcting grammatical errors

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Identifying purpose and context
multi.hover: i.e., clarifying to yourself and to readers what your intentions are and why they're relevant

multi.text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. How much, if at all, do you feel you transferred to the writing in your current course your prior writing skills and knowledge in
Working effectively and appropriately with various media
multi.hover: e.g., researching and composing in appropriate modes, such as alphabetic, visual, audio
